original post.post content: Have any of you joined the military or considered it?

reply_296801.post content: I don't like running. That's 80% of army training.

reply_296820.post content: really doesn't seem like it would be much fun, especially if i get called up to fight in a war or something

reply_296821.post content: Ive considered joining at multiple points but ultimately decided not to. No free time, rape and I am resentful of society. The reason I wanted to join id because i am somewhat suicidal and want to be killed in the future and thought it would be an acceptable way to die.

reply_296823.post content: yeah and i know there's plenty of women who serve, but i figured it's just not worth it. would definitely do it if i was male
